conversation.message:
Dear Parent_B,

Thank you for your note and for approaching this so thoughtfully.

There is a realistic scenario in which we could consider you for the remaining place, but it depends on whether any families with higher admissions priority for Nursery_C come forward. While we still need to keep the place available for that possibility, we are not in a position to make an offer to you right now.

If you would like, we can keep your details on file as an active candidate. If we reach a point where we will release the place to the next group of families, we would contact you directly and ask you to confirm immediate acceptance at that time.

I also don’t want you to be disadvantaged by waiting—please continue pursuing any other available options in parallel.

Kind regards,
Nursery_C Admissions
